title: Lakshmi Kasu Kankanam - Divine Diamond-Studded Bangle
materials: G Color). Features traditional Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
enduring luster. The Lakshmi kasu is crafted with antique gold finish.
features: Openwork bangle design featuring intricately detailed floral motifs embellished with shimmering diamonds. The centerpiece showcases a handcrafted Lakshmi Kasu, embodying prosperity and blessings. The kankanam showcases meticulous filigree work, a hallmark of South Indian artistry.
colors: Warm gold tones accented by the bright white sparkle of the diamonds
creating a captivating contrast. The antique gold finish of the Lakshmi Kasu adds depth and dimension to the design.
occasions: Perfect for auspicious occasions such as weddings (Vivaha Mahotsavam)
Voni Function). A valuable family heirloom to pass down through generations.
description: Exquisite blend of traditional South Indian design and modern diamond setting. The Lakshmi Kasu symbolizes wealth and good fortune, making it an auspicious gift. Meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, ensuring superior quality and lasting beauty. The openwork design ensures comfort and breathability.
